name: One Thousand Ways To Be - Five Track EP
description:
SE BON KI RA 
Debut Five Track EP
ONE THOUSAND WAYS TO BE


The five brutal tracks on this, the band's innagrual offering, are a good strong entry into the metal marketplace.  The EP represents a solid debut of well written groove/thrash rhythms and passionately delivered roaring vocals.  SE BON KI RA have great respect for and are influenced by power/groove/thrash metal legends such as Pantera, Megadeth, Machine Head, and Lamb Of God.

"Just suck it in, set your demons free, this is the pain of one thousand ways to be"

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

rating: 5/5  *****

"These Adelaide boys deliver... If it's metal you want then metal you will get with SE BON KI RA. Hard and fast down and dirty. Give em a whirl and you wont be disappointed!"

Username: spoken22 Jul, 2009
Triple J Unearthed Rating

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

ONE THOUSAND WAYS TO BE track listing:

Lesser Than
Chasing the Vulnerable
One Thousand Ways To Be
Deconstruction Therapy
Shades of Hate
